patthana23.42:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Ārammaṇe cha, anantare samanantare tīṇi, upanissaye purejāte cha, kamme āhāre indriye tīṇi, atthiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana23.42:2.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naanupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana23.42:3.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naanupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho anupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
